name: Gabriella Gugliotta's Portfolio

projects.title: VibeVenture - Event Locator Progressive Web Application
projects.description: Front-end: React, JS, Recharts & hosted on GitHub pages. Back-end: React, JS, Node.js, Express.js (Lambda functions) and hosted on Amazon Web Services.

projects.title: Zing Ping
projects.description: Chat App created in ReactNative, Expo, Andriod SDK, Gifted Chat and Google Firebase. Can be used on both iOS and Android devices.

projects.title: Flickette Movie App - React Version
projects.description: SPA responsive front-end app with routing, interactions, and interface views. Built in ES2015+, Javascript, and React. Utilizes render to connect with my Flickette API and netlify for front-end hosting.

projects.title: Flickette Movie App - Angular Version
projects.description: SPA responsive movie app generated with Angular CLI version 17.0.7. Utilizes routing, interactions, and interface views. Built with Typescript in Angular. Utilizes render to connect with my API and ghpages for front-end hosting.

projects.title: Flickette Movie API
projects.description: Backend application API utilizing MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Bootstrap, Redux and Node.js

projects.title: Pokemon App
projects.description: Built with HTML, CSS, Javascript, JQuery, and Bootstrap that loads external API data to display Pokemon characters and their details

services.title: Front-End Development
services.description:
User Interface (UI) Design: visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript frameworks.
Responsive Web Design: Creating websites that seamlessly adapt to various devices and screen sizes.
Interactive Elements: Implementing dynamic features and interactive elements to enhance user experience.
Front-end Frameworks: Proficiency in using frameworks React and Angular for efficient development.
Cross-Browser Compatibility: Ensuring websites function consistently across different web browsers.

services.title: Back-End Development
services.description:
Server-Side Languages: Expertise inNode.js and JavaScript for server-side programming.
Database Management: Designing, implementing, and managing databases using SQL or NoSQL technologies.
API Development: Creating robust Application Programming Interfaces (APIs) for data exchange between different software systems.
Server Management: Configuring and maintaining servers, ensuring optimal performance and security.
Authentication and Security: Implementing secure user authentication and data protection measures.

services.title: Full-Stack Development
services.description:
End-to-End Web Development: Handling the entire web development process from front-end to back-end, ensuring seamless integration and functionality.
Project Management: Overseeing the entire development lifecycle, managing timelines, resources, and client communication.
Troubleshooting and Maintenance: Providing ongoing support, maintenance, and troubleshooting for websites and web applications.
Integration of Third-Party Services: Incorporating external services and APIs to enhance website functionality.

services.title: Additional Services
services.description:
Content Management Systems (CMS): Proficiency in working with platforms like WordPress for content-driven websites and HubSpot, Google Analytics for website analysis.
Testing and Quality Assurance: Conducting tests to ensure high performance, usability, and security of websites and applications.
Agile Development Methodologies: Implementing agile methodologies for efficient and collaborative project development.

aboutpara: Welcome to my portfolio website! I am a web developer dedicated to crafting user-friendly and accesible web applications that address real-world challenges. Let's connect and explore how my skills and experience can contribute to your team's success.

resume.tagline: From Pixels to Databases: Creating Holistic Web Solutions
resume.description: I am a full-stack web developer with a passion for creating user-friendly and accessible web applications. I have a strong foundation in front-end and back-end development, and I am skilled in using a variety of programming languages, frameworks, and tools. I am dedicated to delivering high-quality, responsive, and interactive web solutions that meet the unique needs of clients and users.

certification.name: CareerFoundry
certification.description: A self-paced, online program that covers the entire web development process, from front-end to back-end, and provides hands-on experience with industry-standard tools, libraries, and frameworks. The program includes a comprehensive curriculum, real-world projects, and mentorship from experienced developers.

education.universityPara: Bachelor of Arts in Law, Politics, and Society; Concentration in Leadership Studies
education.universityActivities: STEM Mentor - Des Moines Public Schools, Community Action Board - President, Service-Learning Ambassador, Big Brothers Big Sisters Mentor, Habitat for Humanity Volunteer,
education.honors: Newman Civic Fellowship - Nationwide Award granted by Iowa Campus Compact and Drake University President
